name: Squegy
description:
My first game creation by way of a James Colestock tutorial that can be found on Udemy. The "Intro to Construct 3 - Build a Platformer" tutorial can be found here: https://www.udemy.com/course/intro-to-construct-3-build-a-platformer/

Not all aspects of the game are from the tutorial, some are also from youtube tutorials as well as posts in the Construct 3 forums.

The credits are all on the game menu.
